verbose_text: The tumor organoids showed increased expression of OLIG2 (XREF_FIG), glial fibrillary acidic protein (GFAP) (XREF_FIG), and SOX2 (XREF_FIG) markers of GBM stem cells, as well as marked increase in proliferation, as evidenced by very extensive Ki-67 labeling within the tdTomato positive electroporated cell population (XREF_FIG).
evidence: expression of OLIG2 ( XREF_FIG ), glial fibrillary acidic protein
